  • Method Details

    • level

      public Brick[] level​(javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle drawArea, int brickCount, int lineCount, double brickSizeRatio, int typeA, int typeB)
      this method is one of the template used for the wall (level). this creates a random brick level.
      Parameters:
      drawArea - this is the area which the bricks could be placed
      brickCount - this is the amount of bricks which will be in for the level.
      lineCount - this is the number of rows of bricks for the level.
      brickSizeRatio - this is the size ratio of the brick.
      typeA - this is one of the type of brick used for this level.
      typeB - this is one of the type of brick used for this level.
      Returns:
      it returns the bricks for the wall (level) in the form of a brick array.
